mapper.select: SELECT bi.id, bi.index_catalog_id, bi.index_code, bi.index_name, bi.unit, bi.`year`, bi.`month`, bi.provice, bi.amount, bi.`group`, bi.corp, bi.create_date, bi.create_by, bi.update_date, bi.update_by, bi.data_update_date FROM bd_index AS bi WHERE bi.index_catalog_id =${index_catalog_id}
